alert.note: Alert for Richland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 2:32AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory through this afternoon, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning from tonight onward, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Richland County. * WHEN... For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold weather is expected to continue into the early next week. Wind chills as low as 45 below may be possible beyond the warning time.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
